trans:
We propose that you include the following contractual clause relating to the above mentioned
contractual relations (the "Clause"):
"In the event of a substantial change or termination of the reference index provided for in this contract
(the "Index"), the provisions outlined in the plan for the Index under Article 28, paragraph 2,
of Regulation (EU) 2016/1011 (Replacement Plan) – section: Alternative index in case of
termination or substantial modification of the index – published on the Bank's website, shall apply.
Pursuant to Article 118-bis of Legislative Decree No. 385 of September 1, 1993 (Consolidated Banking Act), the Bank shall,
within thirty days, notify of any substantial modification (e.g., a change that results
